details.scenario: Delta Airlines wants to track: Aircraft details (make, model, last service, acquisition date), Issues identified during inspections (code, description, time, subsystem), Maintenance engineers (name, contact, work logs)
Tasks: Use ChatGPT or another AI tool to generate an initial draft of a data model.
Review and refine the AI's suggestion: Normalize the schema if needed, Define appropriate data types and constraints, Add relationships and foreign keys
Create your final ER diagram in MySQL Workbench or another modeling tool.
Outputs: A short explanation of your improvements
